subject: refactor: remove period comparison from Overview tab
body:
Remove the Compare dropdown and trend indicators from Overview tab.
Stats now show totals from all filtered commits rather than period-
restricted values.

- Removed Compare dropdown (Last 7 Days / Last 30 Days / Quarter)
- Removed trend indicators from stat cards (↑/↓ vs previous period)
- Simplified renderSummary to use all filtered commits
- Cleaned up related state save/restore and URL params

Use date filters in the filter sidebar for time-based analysis.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01L7a5ghmo78JkckK4qqY2m3
title: remove period comparison from Overview tab
